Lonely Road #60, Dec. 20, 2008

Posted on June 8, 2012 by mike
Reply

Right before Xmas in 2008 I had the pleasure of shooting with this incredibly cute, super-athletic, gal named Chloe. She was a former high school chearleader who totally could ROCK the jump ideas I had in store for her and she brought along a friend as sort of her escort/makeup artist. Let me tell you what happened that day….

OK, as I mentioned, Chloe is just super-cute. Totally bubbly and smiley and with a round booty to go along with that bubble theme. But, like many of the models who would shoot with me for this project, she wasn’t interested in nude stuff. She was down with the notion of flashing a bit of her ass and doing more implied shots, but definitely is not a nude model.

So, like with most gals who shoot with me for the Lonely Roads project, I initially just met her for coffee and discussed the whole concept. I really love getting the chance to meet models beforehand so that they not only can meet me and feel more comfortable with me….but so we also can narrow down “ideas” for their shoot. I want their input, I want to incorporate a portion of “them” and their personality, and I also want in include some of their passions and hobbies if at all possible. So, when I met Chloe, the jumping skills from chearleading were totally evident, but she also loved nature and horses. So, wah lah, I had the PERFECT model for this item I’d found at Goodwill!!

Anyway, we started the shoot with her in a vivid and colorful outfit: Red shoes, red bra, tube socks with red stripes and a fuchsia tutu! Oh, yeah, just an everyday look for most folks! 🙂  But, against a crisp, blue sky……flying thru the air…..we felt it would look awesome. And, you guys will have to be the judge! She posed on the ground in some flexi postions, did some amazing & graceful jumps, and then flashed her booty and laughed!!

Our next oufit was a pair of these sexy, semi-translucent undies which I got from American Apparell partnered with this polka dot dress. Now, I went to school in Milwaukee, WI and my folks live in that area, so, POLKA means a lot to me! “Hey der, hi der, yo heh heh”, Packer Fans!!!! But, this was a bit of a different type of polka though fun nonetheless. Oh, and I had a nearly matching green polka dress that her friend could sport too….so, the combo picture is also included.

Well, as the sun started to fade on our teeny window that we had for this shoot, we still had our best idea left, that special Goodwill bonus: The Toy Horsy!!! Yes, the little thing kids can put between their legs and ride which also would “winnie” when you’d pull on it’s ear!!! Oh, yeah, the PERFECT accessory for a Lonely Road photoshoot, right? EVERY photographer dreams of finding such an amazing edition. Ansel Adams eat your heart out, man!!! Well, I’ll let the pics tell more of the story, but, BOTTOM line, Chloe had a blast fitting her rump in the chaps and blowing kisses at our little friend. I actually ADORE the shot with her in the vivid, white panties and this shot almost made the book! Got down to my final edit…and maybe should’ve included it….but, well, not everything gets in. You’ll definitely see it in some postcards and calendars which are forthcoming…and she deserves a lot of credit for helping create some amazing images with me.

But, as the sun fell behind the western hills, Chloe and I had to quit horsing around and call it a day. Hah, LOL, sooooo predictable and cheesy a sentence, huh? 🙂

The Lonely Road #59, Dec. 14, 2008, Nina Simone

Posted on June 3, 2012 by mike
Reply

Helloooooo, Nina!

She’s a dynamic gal in her mid-30’s who spreads her time between real estate sales, modeling, and bubble-butt ownership! 🙂 And, this gal was soooo fun to shoot with. Loved the notion of the jumps and motion, had a blast skipping around in tutus and also brought a lot of her own ideas to this project including the fairy wand you’ll see in one of the attached photos!!

I look back at all of these shoots and really do appreciate the gals who sorta “did their homework”…ie, they heard me talking about bringing their own “stamp” to the shoot so that we could incorporate a bunch of their own ideas/personality. And, lovely Nina was one of those. She’s athletic, plays a ton of tennis, and couldn’t wait to try all my jumping stuff. And, she kicked ass at it. She also had a cute, little fuschia dress to go with her fairy concept and that was fun to shoot in. Vibrant colors mean so much to my outside/daylight work and Nina had concepts perfect for such situations. She also could laugh endlessly at the situations and shots we came up with when we were out in the desert and I think she’d totally encourage everyone to spend a day nude in public! Yeah, Nina!

I love the stuff she and i shot with the white fur coat on and it was tough for me to narrow down which pictures I’d actually share with you. Anyway, I hope you enjoy them.

Nina and I also shot some killer studio shots at the end of our day together and I included one of those for you to check out. She’s got such a curvy, athletic figure and her round butt was ideal for shooting some images like the one on her side which I’m sharing.

Nina also gave me one incredible gift: She introduced me to a fabulous guy and amazing photographer named Joe Saadeh. Friend of hers, a guy gifted with studio work and owner of a Canon 5D camera that he was kind enough to sell me! Shweet…thru Nina and Joe I was able to totally upgrade some of my imagery post-shoot #59 in the sense that I now had a truly professional camera that could allow me to take better, more vivid pics. Man, without Nina introducing me to Joe, I’d never have been able to get where I’ve gotten. Joe also became a bit of mentor with me and gave me a bit of help with Adobe photoshop and other techniques. And….LOL….you’ll have to ask him for the images he shot of Nina & I together. Oh, yeah, the photographer got in front of the lens with Nina for come couple shots! 🙂

Nina, thanks for blessing my project with your energy, beauty and smile!

Lonely Road, #58, Dec. 13, 2008, Annette

Posted on June 3, 2012 by mike
Reply

Wow. Almost done with my first year of The Lonely Road and I’m already at entry #58. Ah, a busy initial year! Dang…shot a bunch and still have a few more entries to post….including lovely Annette! Bare booty, freezing cold boobies as she dances on a road in near-freezing weather…..You’ll never quite appreciate the challenge of her shoot but I’ll do my best to guide you through what transpired.

OK. Annette lived in Flagstaff, AZ. That’s up at 8000 ft. of elevation! So, even if you’re in AZ, when it’s Dec. 13 you’re not talkin’ balmy weather. And, this little adventurer had no issues walking around nude or nearly naked in the 40 degree environment. Bless her!

So, she and her boyfriend and I met for dinner the night before and I got to introduce myself and show them some outfit ideas. It always helps me to have some time with model beforehand just to get to know one another but also to focus or plans on specific looks.

We chose to head out North from Flagstaff towards the Grand Canyon and use some of the many forest roads you can access up that way. We stumbled upon some cool things like the Kendrick Boys Camp which provided a fun picture idea, watched her freeze her cute ass dancing along a snow-dusted road, and had her pose amongst some properly named trees, Aspens.

Annette…thanks for your zest in the cold temps and I wonder where you’re at today. And, based on our tree photos….I’ve gotta ask you, lady:

“How’s your As-pen?”

Lonely Road #57, Dec. 19, 2008, Jayla

Posted on June 2, 2012 by mike
Reply

Damn….I forgot how stunning and funny this woman is! Jayla and I shot just before Xmas in 2008 and you’ll see her lovely, red outfit with reindeer horns in the posted pics. But, before that, let’s add some keywords that describe Jayla and this shoot:

bare butt, amazing boobs, naked in public, lonely road photography, girls next door, public nudity, girls smoking (though you don’t see the pics…) and Jesus. As in….”Jesus, that Jayla really has such a cute ass, perfect boobs, and is stunning!!!”

OK…let’s get this entry started with a not-too-clothed Jayla, her umbrella, …..moving towards her dressing room…on the Lonely Road. It should help you realize just how cool this girl is:

Jayla Dicking Around

Hah. As she clearly states, if your Lonely Road photographer spends too much time taking videos of you shuffling along naked in your rubber boots, it can be interpretted as either wasting time or……”dicking around”! Hah, again. She made me laugh then and still does today. The other video I have of her shows her smoking and telling the camera how her 5 year old daughter thinks she’s a sinner for doing so! LOL, that’s awesome. To me, if smoking is sinning, then walking around naked with umbrellas more than makes up for it. Sort of “Lonely Road” penance! I forgive her. Do you? 🙂

This mother of two was just killer to work with though! It wasn’t warm that day….maybe low 60’s, and she stuck it out like a trooper! We met in Tucson and drove SE of there towards Sierra Vista to find this cool spot. Jayla and her teeny boobs LOVED the long coat I had, and she looked smokin’ in it. And, how about her with only the orange apron and gloves? Maybe add a well-positioned serving spoon? Yeah, I’d have her over to cook anytime.

I LOVE the hood ornament shot I’ve attached and I think the stripe pics are cool and colorful. I hope you enjoy the apple-eating shot as well as that shows this gals gorgeous smile and boatload of personality. Yeah, Jayla rocked the Lonely.

Last I heard she was in Costa Rica and who knows if our paths can cross again. But, damn it, a lonely road thru a jungle with Jayla along for the ride couldn’t help but be amazing!!

Lonely Road #56, 2009, Another Mystery

Posted on June 2, 2012 by mike
Reply

I’ll be brief with this entry though this gal deserves wayyyyyy more time and discussion. It’s just that certain folks have moved onto other “projects” in their lives and either they or I aren’t as interested in tying their name to this project.

Mystery Model from 2009 is dynamic, stunning and just cute as a button. And, if you figure out who she is and where she’s at today….you’ll see a lot more of her. WAY LOT MORE!

She shot with me a couple times in 2009/2010 and had a ball with my concepts. Heck, her figure is flawless and her face just striking. So, dressing her in cute outfits, having her bare her booty in front of the American Flag…it wasn’t hard to take a nice picture of her. And, creating a fetish shot with handcuffs or taking her perfect ass and an umbrella and having her stand on a dusty trail…you really couldn’t go wrong. Butt, LOL, some folks have big plans and my little project is just a bump in their own road of development.

Her last venture with me involved body paint with this certain guy we found to partake, It’s one of my favorite all-time pics and it’s on my fridge, as a magnet, when you visit me or show up for your own photoshoot.

Anyway, enjoy A mi….I mean “my”….a mystery!

The Lonely Road, #55, In memory of Susan, Nov. 29, 2008

Posted on June 2, 2012 by mike
Reply

I consider my whole approach towards photography and life in general as uplifting, happy and totally “cup-half-full”. But, sometimes things do happen that cause us to pause for a moment and think.

I shot with a lovely woman named Susan..aka, “Wild Child”, late in 2008. She was a lovely and free-spirited woman, in her 40’s, who saw my work… and thought the energy and color and concept totally fitted her personality! And…it did. She was constantly smiling and laughing and had such fun with my work. And, when a guy in quad drove past her while she was in her little school girl outfit, baring her rump, she laughed almost as much as he smiled!!! Ah, yes, the Lonely Road surprise.

But, sadly, other surprises were in store and this totally sucks. In the early part of 2009, this lovely mother of a 9 yr old girl was killed in an automobile accident.

Susan…and her family….I’m so sorry to see you depart this world at such a young age. You’re beautiful, vibrant and charismatic…and I’m sure that wherever you’re at you’re smiling and touching others as positively as you did in this world.

I so hope your husband, daughter and family have done OK adjusting to your passing and thank you for participating in my Lonely Road project.

You’ll always be remembered and I miss you!

Lonely Road #54, RT’s back on Thanksgiving, Nov. 27, 2008

Posted on June 1, 2012 by mike
3

Reagan T is an amazing woman. I had the pleasure of dating this spectacular woman during a portion of the shooting of my Lonely Roads book and she also turned out to be one of my best models. Divorced mother of 2 who’s now, since, remarried and had her 3rd child…she’s just fun & beautiful & spontaneous and was a complete pleasure to photograph and be around. And Ms. Spontaneous totally lived up to her name on Thanksgiving day in 2008!

Being the true traditionalists, she and I blew off the turkey and stuffing, took turkey sandwiches instead with us in the car, drove up I-17 North of Phoenix towards Crown King and the Prescott cutoff, and went looking for some Lonely Roads. We found a wonderful railing and road at the Bumble Bee exit and then went up to the Dumas/Orme exit past Hwy 69 and found this cool vista where we shot her jumping in the mesh scarf which you’ll find in my book.

But, LOL, you get interesting driver reactions when they stumble upon scantily-clad lovelies dancing around on Holidays. Hah, it was a game to catch the sexy peek of her rump sitting over the railing while drivers passed completely unaware. And, it wasn’t the warmest conditions that day….so, you’ve got to offer congrats to the gal who can sit bare-assed on chilly metal! Man, being her boyfriend @ the time I had to rub it a bunch to keep it warm, I’m sure. Hey, sometimes you just gotta do what you gotta do! 🙂

Well, checkout this amazing and stunning gal jumping and sitting and twisting and just being her killer self on the Lonely Road! And…..keep your fingers crossed that she shows up again in Lonely Roads #2. 🙂



Posted in Uncategorized | 3 Replies

Lonely Road #53, Dana & Ashley, Nov.22, 2008

Posted on June 1, 2012 by mike
Reply

LOL, people, this entry just makes me giggle. So, the story behind how these 2 lovelies, Dana & Ashely, actually posed for me is soooo interesting and fun. Are you ready??

Well, at Burning Man in 2008 I did a “Jump for Joy” photo project and got all the participants to pose for 4 pictures. They’d smile @ the camera for #1, Jump for Joy while smiling for #2…simply expressing their joy for being @ Burning man. In pic #3 they’d turn around, bare their butts and pose for a picture….and, in pic #4 they had to jump while bare-butted. Anyway, you may not think much of my ass-focussed creativity, but, I had to walk up to total strangers and get them to do this. I’d actually write down their emails and some identification info…and then actually followed up with them and sent them the images afterwards. Hence, organized “Man of my word”. YES.

Well…one gal I approached was Dana…who gladly wanted “in” my project. But, she actually wanted to jump with me, so, my buddy Scott Cook took our shots. Standing and watching were her friend, John McCoy, and his wife at the time. They didn’t want to partake but turned out to be sculptors who wanted a guy to pose for them for a Vitruvian Man sculpture. And, that guy they chose…..me!! Woo Hoo. So, one of the attached images is of me @ John’s place, covered in plaster, while my two models stood naked next to me and harassed me. Pretty fun, eh? Yeah.

Well, Dana will show up in the book again as she ventured down to visit me in AZ later on and ended up shooting with me for 3 days in 2009. Ashley, sadly, was just a participant for one, quick shoot right at the completion of the casting in front of John and Marjorie’s barn.

So, enjoy Dana and Ashley, the plaster-applying, booty-flashing, goddesses of the Fairfax, CA Farm!

The Lonely Road, #52, Corey Koeppel, Nov. 15, 2008

Posted on May 28, 2012 by mike
Reply

Some models look beautiful. Some are smart. Some spend their whole day texting or complaining about the heat. Some are athletic and great with motion. Some have perfect bubble butts. Some have great boobs and sexy smiles. And, YES OH YES OH YES…some have all of the above and personality, personality, enthusiasm, personality, spunk, no fear, personality, endless energy, a huge sense of humor and personality.

Hey, have you guys met Corey yet? OOOOOH, man, wait till you get to see what Corey’s all about. And, WTF, let’s just let the video I shot with she and my buddy, Scott Cook, better introduce you to all that is Corey Koeppel:

Corey Signs and Flashes

Hah! How was that?? And, LOL, you’ve got Scott in a skirt jumpin’ around and helping out too!!! Yes, that dude is just awesome and as my best friend he sooo helped make a bunch of this book happen!! Cookie, you rock!

But, going back to fabulous Ms. Koeppel. Jeez…she’s so spunky and fun and willing to try everything. So, in the attached photos you’re going to see one sexy & dynamic womman getting to totally be herself, having a ball, while running around half-naked and totally invigorating The Lonely Road.

Corey jumped and completely flashed a truck passing by! Corey posed in front of an abondoned Rock Shop along Highway 93 near Wikeup, AZ and “lived” what their signage suggested! She drank a Monster energy drink and did her best impersonation of a monster. She danced atop a rusty, old storage tank decorated with skull and crossbones! She took some killer, cool b&w shots while posing in front of and jumping over Scott. She sign-languaged me while ONLY wearing a fur coat. In AZ. When it was 90 degrees!! She also gave me a flying “high-five” only wearing shoes. She posed with her cute, bubble butt and showed us her heart-shaped world. She dressed in sexy pink sweater and crouched for a super-sexy series of pics with her boobs sticking out. Hmmm….what else? Oh, yeah, she let Scott balance some rocks on the small of her back and then stood up really quickly so that those rocks would tumble down her legs…..creating???…….the “Rockin’ Ass” photo. Yeah. That’s Corey, that’s incredible, and she is just utterly awesome.

OK…I’m done talking/writing and I’ll have to let the pictures tell you the rest of our Lonely Road story:

The Lonely Road, #51, Jessie James, Nov. 2, 2008

Posted on May 28, 2012 by mike
Reply

Hello, Jessie! Man, I had this fabulously stunning woman come shoot with me in November of 2008 and I forgot how amazing I thought the images were of her wrapped in blue fabric! Anyway, that’s just part of what I’ll be sharing of Jessie and her story today….

Jessie is the ONLY model who showed up with her sister in tow! And, her sister was also her makeup artist. Yeah, Family, baby! Gotta love that. But she and her sister were a ton of fun and we shot on a combination of paved roads as well as dirt trails.

Jessie…at the time…was the single mom of a little girl and I just love the variety of gals I was able to work with. Jessie also hadn’t done much nude or semi-nude work…but she just excelled with my project and ideas. She is blessed with CURVES GALORE…and I think the shot of her jumping in her blue shoes, where you see the stunning muscles of her butt and her back is just striking. And, the shot where she’s bent over but enveloped in the blue fabric is just my damn favorite! God, we got such a killer lighting angle, the sky was perfectly clear, and we somehow hid all of her curves and features amidst that long piece of cotton! Wooo Hooo, Jessie, nice work.

You’ll also see a couple shots of Jessie in a pink dress and also one of her wearing a cowboy hat while covering her breasts. Some good variety and I hope you enjoy them all.

But, if you have a sibling that can escort you on a shoot and also, perhaps, apply some lipstick, dab your brow of sweat ….and…..just encourage the hell out of you…..sign up today to shoot with me on the Lonely Road just like Jessie James! And, HELLO Mike, I think I should contact Jessie for my “Guns ‘n Gals” calendar I’m working on. What a perfectly famous name she’d have to partake in such!
